introduction.section1: Discover the bustling life of Tokyo, the most populous megacity in the world.
introduction.section2: Tokyo is so big that there must be a neighborhood to your liking.
introduction.section3: From trendy, vibrant, and ultra-modern neighborhoods to the deafening silence of downtown parks, every trip to Tokyo offers a different experience.
introduction.section4: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Tokyo
meta-description: Discover the bustling life of Tokyo, the most populous megacity in the world. For each spot, we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
